\\
Government of the \\
\\

\\
![logo](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/assets/icons/logo-right-sm.png)](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/landing)[Department of \\

![logo](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/assets/icons/logo-right-sm.png)](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/landing)

Welcome to Bangladesh e-Passport Portal

[Sign in](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/authorization/login)

Englishবাংলা

A+A-

Welcome to Bangladesh e-Passport Portal

☰

[Sign in](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/authorization/login)

Englishবাংলা

A+A-

- Apply online
- 5 STEPS TO e‑PASSPORT
- Urgent applications
- Instructions
- Passport fees
- Request Emergency Travel Document
- Check status
- Contact

- [Home](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/)
- [Passport fees](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/instructions/passport-fees)

# e-Passport Fees and Payment Options

Last updated: 1 July 2025

## e-Passport Payment

### e-Passport fees can be paid in the following ways:

#### 1\. **Online**: Through "ekpay" _(Payment option: VISA, Master Card, American Express, bKash, Nagad, Rocket, Upay, Dmoney, OK Wallet, Bank Asia, Brack Bank, EBL, City Bank, UCB, AB Bank, DBBL, Midland Bank, MBL Rainbow)_

To check and download online payment slip(eChalan) [**Click Here**](https://ekpay.gov.bd/#/user/bill-history) **or** [**Click Here**](https://billpay.sonalibank.com.bd/Challan/Home)

#### 2\. Offline: Can be paid at any government or private banks through A-Challan (For Self payment [Click Here](https://www.achallan.gov.bd/acs/v2/general/challan-payment?id=1)).

To check and download offline payment slip(aChalan) [**Click Here**](http://103.48.16.132/echalan/)

**Note:**

**Regular Delivery:** Within 15 Working days / 21 days from the biometric enrolment date.

**Express Delivery:** Within 7 Working days / 10 days from the biometric enrolment date.

**Super Express Delivery:** Within 2 Working days from the biometric enrolment date.

**Govt employees who have No Objection Certificate (NOC)/Retirement document (PRL)**

**a**. Express facilities with Regular fees.

**b.** Super-Express facilities with Express fees.

### e-Passport fees for inside Bangladesh (Including 15% VAT)

**e-Passport with 48 pages and 5 years validity**

- Regular delivery: BDT 4,025
- Express delivery: BDT 6,325
- Super Express delivery: BDT 8,625

**e-Passport with 48 pages and 10 years validity**

- Regular delivery: BDT 5,750
- Express delivery: BDT 8,050
- Super Express delivery: BDT 10,350

**e-Passport with 64 pages and 5 years validity**

- Regular delivery: BDT 6,325
- Express delivery: BDT 8,625
- Super Express delivery: BDT 12,075

**e-Passport with 64 pages and 10 years validity**

- Regular delivery: BDT 8,050
- Express delivery: BDT 10,350
- Super Express delivery: BDT 13,800

### e-Passport fees for Bangladesh Mission's General Applicants:

**e-Passport with 48 pages and 5 years validity**

- Regular delivery : USD 100
- Express delivery : USD 150

**e-Passport with 48 pages and 10 years validity**

- Regular delivery : USD 125
- Express delivery : USD 175

**e-Passport with 64 pages and 5 years validity**

- Regular delivery : USD 150
- Express delivery : USD 200

**e-Passport with 64 pages and 10 years validity**

- Regular delivery : USD 175
- Express delivery : USD 225

### e-Passport fees for Bangladesh Mission's Labors and Students:

**e-Passport with 48 pages and 5 years validity**

- Regular delivery : USD 30
- Express delivery : USD 45

**e-Passport with 48 pages and 10 years validity**

- Regular delivery : USD 50
- Express delivery : USD 75

**e-Passport with 64 pages and 5 years validity**

- Regular delivery : USD 150
- Express delivery : USD 200

**e-Passport with 64 pages and 10 years validity**

- Regular delivery : USD 175
- Express delivery : USD 225

[About us](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/instructions/about-us) [Feedback](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/instructions/feedback) [Contact](https://www.epassport.gov.bd/contact)

© Bangladesh e‑Passport Online Registration Portal, v5.5.0

.footer[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { min-height: 100px; padding: 0.5em 0px; background-color: rgb(7, 94, 36); }

.footer__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { flex-direction: column; }

.footer__instruction-links[_ngcontent-lmq-c128], .footer__instruction-links-copyright[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { display: flex; flex-direction: column; }

.footer__instruction-links[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { align-items: center; margin-top: 8px; }

.footer__copyright[_ngcontent-lmq-c128], .footer__instruction-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 0.9em; margin-bottom: 6px; }

.footer__social-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { width: 24px; height: 24px; display: inline-block; margin-right: 20px; }

.footer__social-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c128]:last-child { margin-right: 0px; }

.footer__social-link--twitter[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { background: url("/assets/icons/twitter-logo-24.png") 0px center no-repeat; }

.footer__social-link--facebook[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { background: url("/assets/icons/facebook-logo-24.png") 0px center no-repeat; }

.footer__social-link--youtube[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { background: url("/assets/icons/youtube-logo-24.png") 0px center no-repeat; }

@media only screen and (max-width: 991px) {
  .footer[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { height: auto; padding: 1em; }

  .footer__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { flex-direction: column; padding: 0px; }
  .footer__socials-links[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { display: flex; margin-bottom: 24px; flex-direction: row; justify-content: center; order: 1; }
  .footer__instruction-links[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { text-align: center; order: 2; align-items: center; margin-top: 8px; }
  .footer__instruction-links-copyright[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { order: 3; }

  .footer__instruction-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c128]:last-child { margin-bottom: 0px; }
  .footer__copyright[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0px; font-size: 0.8em; text-align: center; }
  .footer__social-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { width: 32px; height: 32px; margin-right: 24px; display: inline-block; }
  .footer__social-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c128]:last-child { margin-right: 0px; }
  .footer__social-link--twitter[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { background: url("/assets/icons/twitter-logo-32.png") 0px center no-repeat; }
  .footer__social-link--facebook[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { background: url("/assets/icons/facebook-logo-32.png") 0px center no-repeat; }
  .footer__social-link--youtube[_ngcontent-lmq-c128] { background: url("/assets/icons/youtube-logo-32.png") 0px center no-repeat; }

[_nghost-lmq-c204] { position: sticky; width: 100%; z-index: 3; top: 100px; }

.profile-icon[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { width: 24px; height: 24px; }

.full-name[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: none; }

.header-configurator__compound-header[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: flex; justify-content: flex-end; align-items: center; }

.header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .dropdown-toggle__item[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { padding: 0.25em 0px; }

.header-configurator__page-header[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: none; }

.header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { min-width: 300px; max-width: 700px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); min-height: 50px; max-height: 72px; padding: 0.25em 0px; }

.header-configurator__header-title[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { font-size: 1.5em; }

.header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .login-section__link[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { font-weight: 400; font-size: 1em; }

.header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .login-section__user-name[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { padding-right: 0.5em; }

.header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .switch-language__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 1em; background-color: transparent; color: rgb(25, 118, 210); }

.header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button--active[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .switch-language__button--active[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { background-color: rgb(25, 118, 210); padding: 8px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 1em; }

.header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button--disabled[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .switch-language__button--disabled[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { opacity: 0.7; cursor: default; }

.header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { font-size: 1.5em; font-weight: 700; }

.header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button--sm[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { font-size: 1.25em; }

.header-configurator.compound[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { background-color: rgb(247, 247, 247); }

.header-configurator.compound[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .header-configurator__compound-header[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { justify-content: space-between; }

.header-configurator.compound[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { background-color: rgb(247, 247, 247); }

.header-configurator.compound[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .header-configurator__page-header[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: block; font-weight: 700; }

.header-configurator.compound[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .header-configurator__header-settings[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: none; }

.csca-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { width: 100%; background-color: rgb(247, 247, 247); }

.csca-link-position[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { max-width: 84.1%; margin: auto; font-size: 1.5em; }

@media only screen and (max-width: 991px) {
  [_nghost-lmq-c204] { height: auto; position: static; }
  .full-name[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: inline; }
  .csca-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .profile-icon[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: none; }
  .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { position: relative; }
  .header-configurator.compound[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: none; }
  .header-configurator__compound-header[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { flex-direction: column; padding: 0px; }
  .header-configurator__page-header[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: flex; width: 100%; padding: 1em; font-size: 1.1em; font-weight: 700; background-color: rgb(235, 236, 237); justify-content: center; text-align: center; }
  .header-configurator__header-title[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: flex; margin: auto; }
  .header-configurator__header-settings[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { padding-left: 0px; padding-right: 0px; }
  .header-configurator__header-settings-icon[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { width: 24px; height: 24px; }
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { max-height: 200px; background-color: rgb(247, 247, 247); padding: 0px; }
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .login-section[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { margin: 0.5em; }
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .login-section[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .header__link[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { padding-left: 0.5em; }
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .login-section__link[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { margin: 0.5em 0px; padding-left: 0px; font-size: 1em; font-weight: 700; }
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { display: none; }
  .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .switch-language[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { margin: 0.5em; }
  .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .switch-language__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { font-size: 1em; font-weight: 700; }
  .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button--active[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .switch-language__button--active[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { padding: 0.75em; font-size: 1em; }
  .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] + .change-font-size__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .change-font-size__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] + .switch-language__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .switch-language__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] + .change-font-size__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .switch-language__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] + .switch-language__button[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { margin-left: 1.5rem; }
  .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .btn.focus[_ngcontent-lmq-c204], .header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] .btn[_ngcontent-lmq-c204]:focus { outline: 0px; box-shadow: none; }
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 360px) {
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { justify-content: center; align-items: center; }
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 576px) {
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { width: 100vw; }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 577px) and (max-width: 768px) {
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { min-width: 577px; flex-direction: row; }
}

@media only screen and (min-width: 769px) and (max-width: 991px) {
  .header-configurator__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c204] { min-width: 481px; max-width: 640px; }
}</style><style rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">@charset "utf-8";

[_nghost-lmq-c206] { position: sticky; top: 150px; z-index: 2; }

.navbar-menu[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] { background-color: rgb(247, 247, 247); padding: 0px; }

.navbar-menu__container[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] { min-height: 64px; max-height: 200px; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; }

.navbar-menu.navbar[_ngcontent-lmq-c206], .navbar-menu[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] .navbar-collapse[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] { align-items: normal; }

.navbar-menu__list[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] { margin: 0px; padding: 0px; width: 100%; }

.navbar-menu__action-btns[_ngcontent-lmq-c206], .navbar-menu__resposive-header-configurator[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] { display: none; }

.navbar-menu__home-icon[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] { width: 32px; height: 32px; }

.navbar-menu__item[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] { height: 100%; min-height: 64px; font-size: 1em; padding: 1em 0.5em; text-decoration: none; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-align: center; width: 100%; cursor: pointer; }

.navbar-menu__item.active-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c206]:not(.disable-active-link), .navbar-menu__item[_ngcontent-lmq-c206]:hover { background-color: rgb(30, 136, 229); }

.navbar-menu__item.active-link[_ngcontent-lmq-c206]:not(.disable-active-link) a[_ngcontent-lmq-c206], .navbar-menu__item[_ngcontent-lmq-c206]:hover a[_ngcontent-lmq-c206] { color: rgb(255, 255, 255); }

_nghost-lmq-c106=""><router-outlet _ngcontent-lmq-c106=""></router-outlet><vbeop-instruction-page _nghost-lmq-c105=""><div _ngcontent-lmq-c105="" class="instruction-page container mb-40"><div _ngcontent-lmq-c105="" class="row mt--24"><div _ngcontent-lmq-c105="" class="col-md-12"><h1 _ngcontent-lmq-c105="" class="instruction-page__header">e-Passport Fees and Payment Options</h1><p _ngcontent-lmq-c105="" class="instruction-page__last-updated mt-8 mb-24"><span _ngcontent-lmq-c105="">Last updated: </span><span _ngcontent-lmq-c105="" class="text--bold">1 July 2025</span></p><div _ngcontent-lmq-c105=""><h2>e-Passport Payment</h2><h3>e-Passport fees can be paid in the following ways:</h3><h4>1\. <strong>Online</strong>: Through "ekpay" _(Payment option: VISA, Master Card, American Express, bKash, Nagad, Rocket, Upay, Dmoney, OK Wallet, Bank Asia, Brack Bank, EBL, City Bank, UCB, AB Bank, DBBL, Midland Bank, MBL Rainbow)_</h4><div>To check and download online payment slip(eChalan) [**Click Here**](https://ekpay.gov.bd/#/user/bill-history) **or** [**Click Here**](https://billpay.sonalibank.com.bd/Challan/Home)</div><h4>2\. Offline: Can be paid at any government or private banks through A-Challan (For Self payment [Click Here](https://www.achallan.gov.bd/acs/v2/general/challan-payment?id=1)).</h4><div>To check and download offline payment slip(aChalan) [**Click Here**](http://103.48.16.132/echalan/)</div><div><br></div><div><strong>Note:</strong></div><div><strong>Regular Delivery:</strong> Within 15 Working days / 21 days from the biometric enrolment date.</div><div><strong>Express Delivery:</strong> Within 7 Working days / 10 days from the biometric enrolment date.</div><div><strong>Super Express Delivery:</strong> Within 2 Working days from the biometric enrolment date.</div><div><br></div><div><strong>Govt employees who have No Objection Certificate (NOC)/Retirement document (PRL)</strong></div><div><strong>a</strong>. Express facilities with Regular fees.</div><div><strong>b.</strong> Super-Express facilities with Express fees.</div><div><br></div><h3>e-Passport fees for inside Bangladesh (Including 15% VAT)</h3><div><br></div><div><strong>e-Passport with 48 pages and 5 years validity</strong></div><ul><li>Regular delivery: TK 4,025</li><li>Express delivery: TK 6,325</li><li>Super Express delivery: TK 8,625</li></ul><div><br></div><div><strong>e-Passport with 48 pages and 10 years validity</strong></div><ul><li>Regular delivery: TK 5,750</li><li>Express delivery: TK 8,050</li><li>Super Express delivery: TK 10,350</li></ul><div><br></div><div><strong>e-Passport with 64 pages and 5 years validity</strong></div><ul><li>Regular delivery: TK 6,325</li><li>Express delivery: TK 8,625</li><li>Super Express delivery: TK 12,075</li></ul><div><br></div><div><strong>e-Passport with 64 pages and 10 years validity</strong></div><ul><li>Regular delivery: TK 8,050</li><li>Express delivery: TK 10,350</li><li>Super Express delivery: TK 13,800</li></ul><div><br></div><h3>e-Passport fees for Bangladesh Mission's General Applicants:</h3><div><br></div><div><strong>e-Passport with 48 pages and 5 years validity</strong></div><ul><li>Regular delivery : USD 100</li><li>Express delivery : USD 150</li></ul><div><br></div><div><strong>e-Passport with 48 pages and 10 years validity</strong></div><ul><li>Regular delivery : USD 125</li><li>Express delivery : USD 175</li></ul><div><br></div><div><strong>e-Passport with 64 pages and 5 years validity</strong></div><ul><li>Regular delivery : USD 150</li><li>Express delivery : USD 200</li></ul><div><br></div><div><strong>e-Passport with 64 pages and 10 years
